portfolio.title: Website
portfolio.description: I created website utilizing HTML and CSS, emphasizing a design. The project showcases my expertise in structuring content with HTML for optimal accessibility and employing CSS to style elements, ensuring a seamless user experience across devices. The website adapts elegantly to various screen sizes.

portfolio.title: TODO-Lists
portfolio.description: This project showcases my proficiency in JavaScript, enabling users to easily create, update, and remove tasks on a real-time interface.

portfolio.title: OTT App
portfolio.description: I designed and developed an intuitive OTT application using React.js, showcasing seamless CRUD operations for managing a movie database. Users can  filter through a  movie collection, add favorites and remove favorites. users can view movie details by simply clicking on a specific movie.
